# MikroTik RouterOS Security Configuration
# Hardening and service management

/ip service
set telnet disabled=yes
set ftp disabled=yes
set www disabled=yes
set www-ssl disabled=yes
set api disabled=yes
set api-ssl disabled=yes
set ssh port=2222 address=192.168.1.0/24
set winbox port=8291 address=192.168.1.0/24

/user group
add name=monitoring policy=read,winbox,api,rest-api
add name=operators policy=local,telnet,ssh,read,write,test,winbox,password,web,sniff,api,rest-api

/user
add name=admin disabled=yes
add name=netadmin group=full password=complexpassword!@#123
add name=monitor group=monitoring password=viewonly456
add name=netops group=operators password=operatorpwd789

/user ssh-keys
# Import SSH public keys for key-based authentication

/ip ssh
set strong-crypto=yes forwarding-enabled=no

/tool bandwidth-server
set enabled=no

/tool mac-server
set allowed-interface-list=LAN

/tool mac-server mac-winbox
set allowed-interface-list=LAN

/tool mac-server ping
set enabled=no

/tool romon
set enabled=no

/system logging
add topics=info action=memory
add topics=error action=memory
add topics=warning action=memory
add topics=critical action=disk

/system logging action
set disk disk-file-name=log disk-file-count=10 disk-lines-per-file=1000

/snmp
set enabled=yes contact="netops@company.com" location="DC1-Rack5" trap-community=secretcommunity

/snmp community
add name=readonly addresses=192.168.1.0/24 security=private
